problem.problem_statement: Why are bees important for keeping our environment healthy?
problem.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

problem.problem_statement: How can wetlands help clean water and control floods?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

problem.problem_statement: How can controlled burns help manage wildfires?
problem.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

problem.problem_statement: How can growing trees and crops together help feed people and protect the environment?
problem.goalTitle: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

problem.problem_statement: How can we use technology to keep bees safe?
problem.goalTitle: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
